full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB GNYER GSAL BYED RIGS PA'I RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @029A *, ,SLOB GNYER GSAL BYED RIGS PA'I RGYAN 'DI NI, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,DKA' BCU'I MING BTAGS BLO BZANG TSE DPAG GIS, ,CHOS 'KHOR LHUN POR SBYAR BA 'DI YIS KYANG, ,RGYAL BSTAN SNYING PO BLO BZANG GRAGS PA YI, ,BSTAN PA RIN CHEN YUL PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU, ,MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA YONGS KYI NYER 'TSE'I GZHIR, ,SRID MTHA'I BAR DU DAR ZHING RGYAS 'GYUR CIG , ,,
